paragraph.label: 1026-52-b-1-ii-B
paragraph.content: $38 if the card issuer previously imposed a fee pursuant to paragraph (b)(1)(ii)(A) of this section for a violation of the same type that occurred during the same billing cycle or one of the next six billing cycles; or

interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-1-i
interpParagraph.content: For 2015, $1,020, reflecting a 2 percent increase in the CPI-U from June 2013 to June 2014, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-3-i
interpParagraph.content: For 2015, $20,391, reflecting a 2 percent increase in the CPI-U from June 2013 to June 2014, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-i
interpParagraph.content: For 2015, reflecting a 2 percent increase in the CPI-U that was reported on the preceding June 1, a covered transaction is not a qualified mortgage unless the transactions total points and fees do not exceed;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-i-A
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $101,953: 3 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-i-B
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $61,172 but less than $101,953: $3,059;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-i-C
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $20,391 but less than $61,172: 5 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-i-D
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $12,744 but less than $20,391; $1,020;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-i-E
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount less than $12,744: 8 percent of the total loan amount.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-52-b-1-ii-Interp-2-i-B
interpParagraph.content: Card issuers were permitted to impose a fee for violating the terms of an agreement if the fee did not exceed $26 under ยง 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(A) and $37 under ยง 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(B), through December 31, 2014.
